data.name: Sample - Cisco Stealthwatch - 2.1.0
data.description: Stealthwatch is the solution that detects threats across your private network, public clouds, and even in encrypted traffic.

workflows.name: Get Application Traffic by Domain ID
workflows.description: Retrieves inbound and outbound traffic information for a specified Domain ID and datetime range. If you do not specify the datetime range then inbound and outbound traffic information is retrieved for the last 24 hours.

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get Application Traffic by Domain ID

steps.name: Get Application Traffic by Domain ID

arguments.name: Cisco Stealthwatch
arguments.operationTitle: Get Application Traffic by Domain ID

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Application Traffic by Domain ID

workflows.name: Get Application Traffic by Host Group ID
workflows.description: Retrieves inbound and outbound traffic information from Cisco Stealthwatch for the Host Group (tag) ID, Domain (Tenant) ID, and optionally a DateTime range, you have specified. If you do not specify the DateTime range then inbound and outbound traffic information is retrieved for the last 24 hours.

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get Application Traffic by Host Group ID

steps.name: Get Application Traffic by Host Group ID

arguments.name: Cisco Stealthwatch
arguments.operationTitle: Get Application Traffic by Host Group ID

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Application Traffic by Host Group ID

workflows.name: Get Application Traffic by Exporter IP
workflows.description: Retrieves inbound and outbound traffic information for a specified Exporter IP and datetime range. If you do not specify the datetime range then inbound and outbound traffic information is retrieved for the last 24 hours.

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get Application Traffic by Exporter IP

steps.name: Get Application Traffic by Exporter IP

arguments.name: Cisco Stealthwatch
arguments.operationTitle: Get Application Traffic by Exporter IP

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Application Traffic by Exporter IP

workflows.name: Get Domain Details
workflows.description: Retrieves information for all the domains. Retrieves the IDs of all the tenants (domains) from Cisco StealthWatch.

workflows.name: Get Flow Search Status
workflows.description: Retrieves the status of a specified flow search, based on the tenant ID and query ID you have specified.

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get Flow Search Status

workflows.name: Get Flow Search Results
workflows.description: Retrieves the result of a specified flow search, based on the tenant ID and query ID you have specified.

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get Flow Search Results

workflows.name: Get Host Groups List
workflows.description: Retrieves all host tags (groups) for the specific tenant and host type.

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get Host Groups List

workflows.name: Get Host Group Details
workflows.description: Retrieves details of host tag (group) for the specific tenant and host type.

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get Host Group Details

workflows.name: Get External Threats Top Alarm Host
workflows.description: Retrieves the top alarming hosts for an External Threat Tag (tagId) of a Tenant (tenantId).

steps.name: Get External Threats Top Alarm Host

arguments.name: Cisco Stealthwatch
arguments.operationTitle: Get External Threats Top Alarm Host

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get External Threats Top Alarm Host

routes.name: Alerts -> Get External Threats Top Alarm Host

workflows.name: Get Top Conversation Flow Search Result
workflows.description: Retrieves the result of a specified top conversation flow search, based on the tenant ID and query ID you have specified.

steps.name: Get Top Conversation Flow Search Result

arguments.name: Cisco Stealthwatch
arguments.operationTitle: Get Top Conversation Flow Search Result

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Get Top Conversation Flow Search Result

routes.name: Alerts -> Get Top Conversation Flow Search Result

workflows.name: Initiate Flow Search
workflows.description: Initiates a flow search on Cisco StealthWatch, based on the tenant ID, search name and other filters you have specified.

workflows.name: Initiate Flow Analysis
workflows.description: Initiates a top conversation flow report search on Cisco Stealthwatch, based on the tenant (domain) ID, advance search filter as JSON.

workflows.name: Initiate Top Conversation Flow Search
workflows.description: Initiates a top conversation flow report search on Cisco StealthWatch, based on the tenant ID, search name and other filters you have specified.

arguments.title: Cisco Stealthwatch: Initiate Top Conversation Flow Search

routes.name: Alerts -> Initiate Top Conversation Flow Search

workflows.description: Retrieves the status of a specified top conversation flow search, based on the tenant ID and query ID you have specified.
